Categories

Additionally there are Tutorials that may have the solution you are looking for.

Contents

  • 1 MySQL Error 1136 when importing theme
  • 2 Removing Administrator Debug Info
  • 3 Edit Post Time Restriction Setting
  • 4 Moving and deleting forums
  • 5 Login/Logout/Cookie Problems
  • 6 Removing Reputation System

A MySQL error 1136 occurs when importing a theme. http://community.mybboard.net/showthread.php?tid=5239

At the bottom of the forum, administrators see debug information such as SQL queries, GZip, and generation time. The link below describes how to remove it. http://community.mybboard.net/showthread.php?tid=5540

The setting for restricting post editing to a certain time was not included in versions before 1.2.0 by default. http://community.mybboard.net/showthread.php?tid=5630

If you move a subforum to a new parent forum and delete its original parent forum, the subforum may be deleted as well. http://community.mybboard.net/showthread.php?tid=6392&pid=39180#pid39180

If you are having login/logout or otherwise suspect cookie problems, see Cookie Settings. Additionally, try to clear your cookies.
